page.title: 07EDUCATION
page.content:
Sunday school is held in St.Andrews church in Langar for about {1 hour}.
About {15 children} meet to talk,sing and pray with their two teachers.
Evening classes are held for adults in Barnstone Village Hall for Swing into Shape,Yoga and Ballroom Dancing.
The children go to Playgroup on Tuesdays,Thursdays and Fridays,they are there for{3 hours}from{9-12.}There are about {22 children}.
The Village School is divided in {3 {classes,}in the 1842 building the infants work,the ages go from {5-7} and the juniors from 7-11. The clubs we have are recorders,chess,netball, football,gymnastics,guitars and swimming.
